history.narrative: Law 7-121, the “Vendors Regulation Amendment Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-303, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 1, 1988 and March 15, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 31, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-167 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
